text:
I have a 2.0.52 server on Linux box with CheckSpelling enabled. This allows me that client can browse http://server.com/folder/ while the correct folder name is Folder.

The same configuration but on 2.2.3 doesn't generate the same result. A 404 error is raised.

I'm assuming that this is a bug on this version.
Is this true?
creator: jmgorro@gmail.com

text:
> I'm assuming that this is a bug on this version.
> Is this true?
> 

Yes. And this bug was corrected in 2.2.9.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 43562 ***
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
